mobibam.title: MOBIBAM
mobibam.smallTitle: First-year Internship - 2017 - 3 months - Graphic Designer / Web Integrator

block1.subtitle: Company Overview
block1.text1: Mobibam is a BtoC company located at Station F in Paris, specializing in custom furniture. They offer services to customers for creating their own custom-made furniture.
block1.text2: Mobibam focuses on each individual's personality and space, striving to meet customer requests promptly.
block1.text3: Their goal is to simplify, accelerate, and reduce costs to provide a quality service made in France.

block.text1: As a Graphic Designer and Web Integrator at Mobibam, I had the opportunity to work on an exciting project: the development of an interactive toolbar for the online 3D configurator. My goal was to create an immersive and engaging experience for our customers, allowing them to visualize our custom-made furniture realistically.
block.text2: Using my HTML and CSS skills, I designed an intuitive toolbar that allows users to browse and select different types of furniture we offer. I ensured that the toolbar was aesthetically appealing and easy to use, highlighting furniture categories clearly and visually.
block.text3: To add a touch of animation and interactivity, I implemented hover animations for the furniture items. When users hover over a piece of furniture, it animates by opening drawers or cabinets, providing an immersive visual experience. This feature allows customers to easily envision their future space and appreciate the details and functionality.
block.text4: Another important consideration was to make this functionality accessible across different devices. Therefore, I adapted the interactive toolbar to be responsive, meaning it adapts to different screen sizes, whether on a tablet or mobile. This way, our customers can use the 3D configurator and explore our range of custom-made furniture anytime, anywhere.

block.text1: As a Graphic Designer / Web Integrator at Mobibam, I worked on various print communication materials to promote our custom-made furniture. These materials included a kakemono, a brochure, a flyer, a discount card, and a construction manual. Through these print communication materials, my aim was to showcase Mobibam's expertise in creating custom French furniture, offering our customers a unique and personalized experience in interior design.
block.text2: The discount card serves as a way to foster customer loyalty for their future design projects. The card I created provides benefits and discounts on our custom-made products.
block.text3: The brochure is an essential medium for presenting our range of furniture. I created a visually appealing brochure, highlighting our achievements and emphasizing the quality, durability, and design of our products.
block.text4: The construction manual is a practical and informative tool that guides our customers through the assembly process of their custom-made furniture. I developed a clear and detailed tutorial, complete with diagrams and instructions, to facilitate the construction process for our customers.
block.text5: The kakemono is a powerful tool for capturing attention at events. It showcases our flagship product and acts as a mobile showcase for our custom creations.
block.text6: The flyer is an effective tool for enticing customers to visit our showroom. I utilized furniture visuals, illustrations, and compelling messages to introduce and promote our creations.

meet-in-class.title: MEET IN CLASS
meet-in-class.smallTitle: Second and Third-Year Internship - 2018 and 2019 - 4 and 6 months - UX Designer

block1.subtitle: Company Overview
block1.text1: MeetinClass is an innovative company that offers a solution for small-group tutoring with a clear goal: to make tutoring accessible to all. Students can share the costs of tutoring sessions, allowing them to benefit from the expertise of experienced teachers at an affordable price.
block1.text2: MeetinClass has adapted to the challenges posed by the COVID-19 pandemic and swiftly implemented online classes to continue supporting students despite the restrictions. Through this transition, students can now receive educational support from experienced teachers wherever they are, utilizing advanced digital tools.

meet-in-class.subtitle: My Responsibilities

list.0: UX design for the application dashboard
list.1: Creation of web and print communication materials
Analysis and design of ergonomic interfaces for a SAAS application
list.2: Blog article conception and writing, visual selection for social media
list.3: Planning and creation of targeted advertisements on social media.

block1.title: "TEACHERS" PAGE
block1.text: As a UI/UX designer, I was responsible for revamping the "Teachers" page and the "Courses" page. I began with an analysis of the website and competitors such as Kelclass, Superprof, Voscours, etc. Here are the key findings:

list.0: Information: photo, first name, experience, location
list.1: Contact : send a message, call MeetinClass, request a lesson
list.2: About section written by the teacher

list.1: Absence of reviews or recommendations from former students and parents that could reassure prospective clients
list.2: Separation of teachers from the courses they offer

block4.title: Redesign :
block4.text1: We now have a more detailed and reassuring "Teachers" page for students and parents.
block4.text2: At a glance, users can get an overview of the teacher, the subjects they teach, and the number of reviews they have received.
block4.text3: Our certified teachers now have a certification badge. Each teacher has the opportunity to take a proficiency test to validate their teaching skills.
block4.text4: The "About" section is initially condensed and can be expanded by students or parents to learn more.
block4.text5: The courses offered by the teacher are displayed, allowing students to enroll directly without waiting for another student to sign up to create a course.
block4.text6: Finally, each student or parent has the option to leave a review for the teacher after the lesson.

block1.title: A Platform for Teachers
block1.text1: MeetinClass aims to provide teachers with a user-friendly SAAS platform that allows them to focus primarily on their students.
block1.text2: The "Dashboard" page provides teachers with an overview of their upcoming classes, their balance, the payment history of students, and allows them to manage their weekly availability.
block1.text3: The "My Courses" page allows teachers to access their available courses and the list of enrolled students. They have the option to modify the schedule but cannot delete it. In case of absence, teachers can inform MeetinClass.
block1.text4: On the "My Sessions" page, teachers can review their course history, verify completed payments, and revisit the follow-ups they have sent via email.
block1.text5: The SAAS platform is also responsive, enabling teachers to easily access it from their phones.

block2.title: A Platform for Middle and High Schools
block2.text: MeetinClass has established partnerships with schools, allowing middle and high school students to benefit from support classes after regular school hours. To meet this need, a dedicated page for schools has been developed, enabling administrators and supervisors to manage these classes. On this page, they have access to the list of students by class and the private tutors from MeetinClass who are involved.

block1.title: Editorial Calendar
block1.text1: At MeetinClass, I played a versatile role and had a strong appetite for learning, constantly seeking to improve. I actively contributed to the development of the editorial calendar, participating in the creation of Facebook advertisements, and conducting tests to determine the most impactful ads.
block1.text2: Furthermore, I had the opportunity to create articles for their blog, enhancing them with illustrations, as well as producing videos for MeetinClass' YouTube channel.

block2.title: Blog Articles
block2.text1: MeetinClass has developed a blog to share relevant tips and information about education. Through this platform, I had the opportunity to write blog articles and enhance my skills using Wordpress.
block2.text2: Through this blog, I also had the chance to unleash my creativity by designing infographics that visually complemented the article content. By combining text and images, I provided an enriching experience for readers, making the content more engaging and easy to comprehend.

block3.title: YouTube Videos
block3.text: I edited YouTube videos aimed at promoting MeetinClass and increasing its visibility among parents. Through these videos, I highlighted the advantages and unique features of our educational platform while providing entertaining and informative content. By utilizing professional editing techniques and creating captivating content, we were able to reach a broad audience of parents interested in online education.

block4.title: Facebook Advertisements
block4.text: To optimize our advertising strategy on Facebook, we created two ads with distinct variables to better understand our target audience. The aim was to refine our approach and deliver more targeted messaging that resonates with our desired demographic.
